mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.seq_no AS seqNo, a.project_id AS natrualkey, a.project_name AS name, a.year_code AS yearCode, a.customer_id AS customerId, a.area_id AS areaId, a.series_id AS seriesId, a.creater AS creater, date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createTime, a.version AS version, a.sample_delivery AS sampleDelivery, a.is_need_swatch AS isNeedSwatch, a.is_need_preoffer AS isNeedPreOffer, a.need_preoffer_date AS needPreOfferDate, a.sketch_received_date AS sketchReceivedDate, a.file_location AS fileLocation, b.category_a_id AS categoryAid, b.category_a_name AS categoryAname, b.category_b_id AS categoryBid, b.category_b_name AS categoryBname, b.collection_number AS collectionNumber, b.main_color_ids AS mainColorNames, b.sex_ids AS sexIds, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.remark AS remark
mapper.select:
select
FROM t_kf_project_item a ,t_kf_project_item_bom_baseinfo b WHERE a.project_id =#{natrualkey} and a.project_id = b.project_id limit 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_kf_project_item where del_flag=0
mapper.update: update t_kf_project_item set project_name=#{name}, year_code=#{yearCode}, customer_id=#{customerId}, area_id =#{areaId}, series_id =#{seriesId}, creater =#{creater}, version =#{version}, sample_delivery =#{sampleDelivery}, is_need_swatch =#{isNeedSwatch}, is_need_preoffer =#{isNeedPreOffer}, need_preoffer_date =#{needPreOfferDate}, sketch_received_date =#{sketchReceivedDate}, file_location =#{fileLocation}, remark=#{remark} WHERE project_id =#{natrualkey}

update t_kf_project_item_bom_baseinfo set project_name=#{name}, category_a_id=#{categoryAid}, category_a_name =#{categoryAname}, category_b_id =#{categoryBid}, category_b_name =#{categoryBname}, collection_number =#{collectionNumber}, main_color_ids =#{mainColorNames}, sex_ids =#{sexIds}, remark=#{remark} WHERE project_id =#{natrualkey}
mapper.select: select case when max(seq_no) is NULL then 0 else max(project_id) end from t_kf_project_item t where year_code = #{yearCode} and customer_id=#{customerId} and area_id =#{areaId} and series_id =#{seriesId}
select project_id AS natrualkey, project_name AS name from t_kf_project_item where del_flag=0 and project_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
